segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is creating quite a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring onto the floor, and the woman doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting larger by the second, and it's going to be a slip hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets and floor are going to be damaged if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such a simple problem escalate into a potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around and sees the water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are distracted by the cookies, so they won't be any help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a situation that needs immediate attention, but no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to intervene before the whole kitchen is flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a simple fix, but it's being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR
